1 #include "GoalGeneratorNearest2D.hpp"
2 #include "Converter.hpp"
3 
4 #include <cmath>
5 
6 geometry_msgs::TransformStamped GoalGeneratorNearest2D::evalGoal() {
7  auto pose = lookupTransform(base_frame_, object_frame_);
8 
9  const double &r = goal_dist_from_obj_;
10  geometry_msgs::Vector3 &translation = pose.transform.translation;
11  geometry_msgs::Quaternion &rotation = pose.transform.rotation;
12 
13  double alpha = atan2(translation.y, translation.x);
14 
15  translation.x = translation.x - r * cos(alpha);
16  translation.y = translation.y - r * sin(alpha);
17  translation.z = 0;
18  Converter::setQuaternionRotation(rotation, RPY{0, 0, alpha});
19 
20  auto map_base = lookupTransform(map_frame_, base_frame_);
21  auto map_base_tf = Converter::convertToTfPose(map_base);
22  auto base_object_tf = Converter::convertToTfPose(pose);
23  auto &map_object_tf = map_base_tf;
24  map_object_tf *= base_object_tf;
25 
26  tf2::convert(map_base_tf, pose);
27 
28  pose.header.frame_id = map_frame_;
29  pose.child_frame_id = object_frame_;
30 
31  return pose;
32 }
